Journal.Title: Enfermedades infecciosas y microbiologia clinica (English ed.)

Article.ArticleTitle: Long-COVID psychological symptoms in child and adolescent population: A standardized proposal for its exploration.

AffiliationInfo.Affiliation: Facultad de Ciencias de la Salud, Universidad Internacional de La Rioja (UNIR), Logroño, Spain. Electronic address: juanantonio.becerra@unir.net.
